snippet: President Obama will appoint Antony J. Blinken as the deputy secretary of state, in what may be the first step in a reordering of his top foreign policy staff.
abstract: Pres Obama will appoint Antony J Blinken as the deputy secretary of state, placing one of his closest advisers in the State Department’s No. 2 post; Blinken is currently the deputy national security adviser.
lead_paragraph: President Obama will appoint Antony J. Blinken as the deputy secretary of state, in what may be the first step in a reordering of his top foreign policy staff.

headline.main: Obama Makes His Choice for No. 2 Post at State Department
